opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Dormire, Superintendent, Jefferson City Correctional Center v. Koste

opinion:
535 U.S. 967

DORMIRE, SUPERINTENDENT, JEFFERSON CITY CORRECTIONAL CENTER
v.
KOSTE.

No. 01-948.

Supreme Court of the United States.

April 1, 2002.

1

C. A. 8th Cir. Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Mickens v. Taylor, ante, p. 162. Reported below: 260 F. 3d 872.
